entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:20 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -36.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 10:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -36.5°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -40.5°C
Wind: WNW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
